properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 3:45PM EST until January 4 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...GUSTY WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS CONTINUE INTO THIS WEEKEND...

.A strong cold front will approach the region tonight and pass
through Saturday. Southwest winds will increase to 20 to 30 knots
this evening over the coastal waters, becoming west to northwest
and increasing to 30 to 40 knots behind the front Saturday night
into Sunday morning.

* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25
kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 6 to 9 feet. For the Gale
Watch, northwest winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and
seas 6 to 9 feet possible.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Cape Lookout to Surf City.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 PM EST Saturday.
For the Gale Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
